# Example from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breadth-first_search diagram
# 0 => 1
1 88
# 1 => 2, 3, 4
2 19 3 29 4 39
# 2 => 5, 6
5 89 6 99
# 3 => NONE

# 4 => 7, 8
7 46 8 99
# 5 => 9, 10
9 91 10 92
# 6 => NONE

# 7 => 11, 12
11 95 12 7
# 8 => NONE

# 9 => NONE

# 10 => NONE
12 77
# 11 => NONE

# 12 => NONE
